Text.Page:
All the kulkari attacks have half the researchers ready to pull out. Kill {@LinkCreature:26#1001#forestwalker shamans} and {@LinkCreature:26#1002#forestwalker thrashers} to keep them feeling safe.

Report to Nileen when you're finished and the federation will reward you.
Their deaths are lamentable, but they brought this upon themselves.
So long as the {@LinkCreature:26#1001#forestwalker shamans} and {@LinkCreature:26#1002#forestwalker thrashers} threaten the balance, you are authorized to slay them for a bounty.
